org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.idp.metadata

Class SamlMetadataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.idp.metadata.SamlMetadataController

  • @Controller(value="samlMetadataController")
public final class SamlMetadataController
extends java.lang.Object
    The SamlMetadataController will attempt to produce saml metadata for CAS as an identity provider.
    Since:
    4.3

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="/idp/metadata")
public void generateMetadataForIdp(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                                                                               throws java.io.IOException
